GLOBAL.NAME: Name
GLOBAL.ERROR_403: Accessing the vaccination module was rejected or took too long. Please try again to access the vaccination module with your EPD portal.
GLOBAL.UNSUPPORTED_LANGUAGE: The {{lang}} language is not supported by the vaccination module.
GLOBAL.ERROR_404: The page you are looking for does not exist
GLOBAL.UNEXPECTED_ERROR: An unexpected error occurred. The requested action could not be performed.
GLOBAL.END_DATE_BEFORE_START_DATE: The end must be after the beginning.
GLOBAL.NOT_FUTURE_DATE: Date must not be in the future.
GLOBAL.LOGO_VACCINATION_MODULE: Logo of the Vaccination Module, go to the vaccination record
GLOBAL.DATE_FORMAT: Please enter the date. Use the format Day, Day, Dot, Month, Month, Dot, Year, Year, Year, Year. For example, 01.01.2023
GLOBAL.LANGUAGE_HELP_TEXT: Select the language in which you want to use the vaccination module.

GLOBAL.DISCONNECT: The EPR connection has been interrupted. Please close the vaccination module and log in to your EPR again. You can then restart the vaccination module in your document view.
GLOBAL.VALIDATION_TEXT: Please edit the entry to validate it.
